How many people are affected by familial male-limited precocious puberty ?,Familial male-limited precocious puberty is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,familial male-limited precocious puberty
What are the genetic changes related to familial male-limited precocious puberty ?,"Familial male-limited precocious puberty can be caused by mutations in the LHCGR gene. This gene provides instructions for making a receptor protein called the luteinizing hormone/chori
